TEXT: Cards portalled in from other games! Self-inflict damage for potent effects, and heal up what you've lost.
Cards featured from the games: NL One Step From Eden NL Tower Tactics Liberation NL Monster Train NL Inscryption NL Storybook Brawl NL NL Check them all out on Steam!
Something in the Wildwood unsettles my mind, granting me visions of its very Roots.
